amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Sewers; resolution to construct, purchase, or acquire; vote required.
amendatorysection.para: Upon compliance with sections 17-913 to 17-916, the city council or village board of trustees may by resolution order the making, reconstruction, purchase, or otherwise acquiring of any of the improvements provided for in section 17-913. The vote upon any such resolution shall be as required by section 17-616.
